attributes.action: Allow Scotland to have a Referendum for independence to secure a place in the EU
attributes.additional_details: Scotland voted to remain in the EU in the EU Referendum, being removed will have a disastrous affect on Scotland.
attributes.background: At the first referendum, the people of Scotland were told that if we left the UK we would leave the EU, so people voted No to independence as they did not want to leave the UK. Now Scotland are being removed from the EU against its will
